title: Crypto Market Retreats, Bitcoin Down 8% Since Peak Ahead of Powell’s Jackson Hole Remarks
summary: Bitcoin fell below $113,000, pulling the crypto market down 1.5% to $3.9 trillion as profit-taking deepened ahead of Powell’s Jackson Hole speech. The post Crypto Market Retreats, Bitcoin Down 8% Since Peak Ahead of Powell’s Jackson Hole Remarks appeared first on Cryptonews .
